newsitem.title: USA: State Auto Financial names Johnston CFO.
newsitem.headline: State Auto Financial names Johnston CFO.

text.p: State Auto Financial Corpsaid Friday it has named Steven Johnston chief financial officer and treasurer effective April 1. He succeeds Urlin Harris, who will retire on March 31, after nearly 35 years.
Previously, Johnston was vice president, assistant to the president and chief actuary, said the company.

The company also said that Noreen Johnson, director of corporate communications, has been elected assistant vice president. She joined State Auto in 1992 after serving as president of the Ohio Insurance Institute.
State Auto Financial Corp. is a property and casualty insurance holding company.
